Films about White people

Published on Sunday, January 24, 2021

Sometimes I
feel that I am
a
bad
Black
girl
because whenever
my white girlfriend
and I sift through
Netflix
Prime Video
or anything
with a reasonable trial
period
and she says ‚Äúlet‚Äôs
watch this
movie or that‚Äù
featuring Black stories
I instead
elect to watch a white
narrative
because it‚Äôs nice
to forget
about
racism
and the teacher
who called me
a monkey
and
the no one
who called him
out
and
being a bit
Black
and being
a bit
white

I'm Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they), a researcher, designer, queer facilitator, and IndieWeb advocate from Amsterdam. If you found anything on this website of value and want to say thank you, you can support me via Ko-Fi or PayPal.
